name: D365_RetrieveAccessTeamTemplates
description: Retrieves all the access team templates and writes to the artifact directory
author: Vikas Rajan

inputs.name: connectionstring
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please refer [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/developer/common-data-service/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#connection-string-parameters) for the connection string syntax

inputs.name: destinationfile
inputs.label: Output File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path to the output file. The file should have an extension of '.json'. If the file does not exist, the file will be created.
